promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a massive strong deer dark-type with purple cosmic hooves. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or deer. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Astraldeer, a massive strong deer dark-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Moonlight Blade, Darkness Fang. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word deer or dark or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, deer-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Astraldeer, a mysterious cave dweller, moves with powerful grace. Its Moonlight Blade and Darkness Fang strike swiftly and precisely.
